name: DoWnStAiR [LudumDare48 version]
description:
Control:

WSAD - movement right-left-forward-backward

Mouse movement - turn left-right (sometimes it turns on in a competitive build;)) RMB - Attack + Movement. In order to learn how to hit correctly, you have to try.

F - turn on / off the flashlight, otherwise it is still dark in the cave as in … Cave

UPD. for the atack - you need to hold down the right mouse button. the control anchor moves in a hemisphere around the player. the faster the blow, the more damage

Music is turned on in the settings menu.

Goblin found a map of an abandoned city. He went to loot it. Goblin began to pull all the levers there because of his stupidity and natural curiosity. The rooms began to fill with poisonous gas after another twitching of everything in a row and for the worse the exit was blocked. Goblin saw the second exit from the dungeon on the map at the very bottom of the mine … This was just the beginning …

UPD. this version for LudumDare48. this need some troubles. we want finished this project. follow our page for take news about it.
